attributes.action: restore the right of citizens to carry weapons for personal defence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
the right to bear arms has been a right of free peoples throughout history, and one of the main freedoms which have distinguished a free person from a slave. 
since criminals will carry and use arms regardless of the law, we would ask the prime minister to restore the right of the british citizen to carry arms. this would allow effective self-protection and would also indicate that the state has finally seen the error in ordering it's own people to remain defenceless in a climate of increasing crime.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
